sentences.sContent: Sabrina had none of the vanity so often associated with beautiful women.
sentences.sCn: 萨布里娜没有一点漂亮女人经常会有的那种虚荣。

synos.tran: 虚荣心；空虚；浮华；无价值的东西

phrases.pCn: n. （妇女手提包中的）化妆镜

trans.tranCn: 虚荣心；空虚；浮华；无价值的东西
trans.tranOther: too much pride in yourself, so that you are always thinking about yourself and your appearance
